SKT_FIRST.name: Meow Meow Zap!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000005_1_1]</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000005_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Lightning Bolt!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies.\nAttacks all enemies if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> is currently increased.
description: Attacks 2 enemies.\nAttacks all enemies if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> is currently increased.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Meowteor Shower
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000005_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases all allies' Accuracy during the Skill Chain attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases all allies' Accuracy during the Skill Chain attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000005_backup_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000005_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
